name: Chainz 2: Relinked
description: Itâ€™s link-matching madness with Chainz 2: Relinked. Rotate the colored links to make matches of three or more in Classic Mode. Pit your link-matching skills against the clock in Arcade Mode. Ponder every precious move in Strategy Mode. Twist your brain and clear all the links in Puzzle Mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XPProcessor: Pentium II 300MHzMemory: 128MB RAMDirectX®: DirectX 7 (DirectX 8 or higher needed for Hardware Acceleration)Hard Drive: 20MB free HD spaceSound: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: When nothing goes right, play Chainz 2

Basically just a Bejeweled clone but this time with chains. You got a few different modes like time attack, arcade, strategy & puzzle mode. It's not a bad clone but doesn't really do anything different and I can't recommend it for the current price.
